summary: love is all about the wind
title: love is all about the wind
description:
by BittersweetDreamer

Walking swiftly into her chambers, Arya remembers a time Jon had once called her pretty. And as she collapses in the seat by the window, bathed in the fading light of a barely risen sun, she wonders if he still will.

-The Season 8 Reunion Everyone Asked For-

blog.name: thegoodheartedone
blog.title: The Winter Rose
blog.description: Whether it's Westeros or MCU, I always follow the Starks

summary:
I just can’t get over this moment in Dance, when Bran wargs into Hodor to battle the wights: 

For a moment Bran thought it was...
body:
I just can’t get over this moment in Dance, when Bran wargs into Hodor to battle the wights:

For a moment Bran thought it was his sister Arya … madly, for he knew his little sister was a thousand leagues away, or dead. And yet there she was, whirling, a scrawny thing, ragged, wild, her hair atangle. Tears filled Hodor’s eyes and froze there.

Bran crying when he thinks he sees his sister Arya. Ohmygod. My heart breaks for these two. They’ve been through so much. I can’t wait for a Bran+Arya teamup in Season 8. Two of the most powerful characters, especially now that the long night is here. AARRGH!!

reblog.comment:

Bran crying when he thinks he sees his sister Arya. Ohmygod. My heart breaks for these two. They’ve been through so much. I can’t wait for a Bran+Arya teamup in Season 8. Two of the most powerful characters, especially now that the long night is here. AARRGH!!

Bran crying when he thinks he sees his sister Arya. Ohmygod. My heart breaks for these two. They’ve been through so much. I can’t wait for a Bran+Arya teamup in Season 8. Two of the most powerful characters, especially now that the long night is here. AARRGH!!

blog.name: iheartgot
blog.title: IHEARTGOT
blog.description:
IHEARTGOT is dedicated to the HBO television series Game of Thrones, which is based on the A Song of Ice and Fire novels written by George R. R. Martin, and its cast. We update daily to bring you the latest pictures, edits, gifs and more of the show and the books. 
This is NOT a spoiler-free blog.
We track #iheartgot.

summary: “All right, we want to say something to our girls. Sansa, you’re a softie but a straight-up boss inside. Arya, you’re the exact...
body:
“All right, we want to say something to our girls. Sansa, you’re a softie but a straight-up boss inside. Arya, you’re the exact opposite. You all inspire us and we love you.”

-Jon on behalf of their brothers

summary: that secret that you know (but you don't know how to tell)
title: that secret that you know (but you don't know how to tell)
description:
by longhairandbarefeet

“Did you like it?” Jon asks anxiously. He’s turning the knob down on the radio, and is biting at the skin on his chapped lips, it’s a nervous habit of his to do, but it’s a bad habit of hers to wish he’d do that to her mouth instead. The thought of him reaching over, kissing her, and pushing his teeth into the skin of her bottom lip causes warmth to spread in her body like fire in her veins, a much-accepted feeling in the middle of the night, in the middle of December, and in a car without heat.

aka

a modern jon and arya au

title: S7 Budget!AU
body:
Okay but imagine one thing. GoT team doesn’t mess up and actually includes Ghost in the script.

Think of the reunions.

Littlefinger bores talks to Sansa in the courtyard but they’re interrupted by Ghost. He ignores Littlefinger, looking at Sansa and wagging his tail, slowly backing away towards the gate. And suddenly she just knows.

When Arya comes home, the guards won’t let her in. Ghost comes between them, growls at the two morons angrily and licks Arya’s face. “Welcome home, Auntie. Mom’s upstairs.”

And then he fucking eats Littlefinger alive being all like: “Jon Snow sends his regards.”

reblog.comment:

summary: "He's to marry Arya Stark. My little sister." Jon could almost see her in that moment, long-faced and gawky, all knobby knees...
body:
“He’s to marry Arya Stark. My little sister.” Jon could almost see her in that moment, long-faced and gawky, all knobby knees and sharp elbows, with her dirty face and tangled hair. […] His fingers closed around the parchment. Would that they could crush Ramsay Bolton’s throat as easily.

Gendry was at his forge, bare-chested beneath his leather apron. He was beating on a sword as if he wished it were a foe, his sweat-soaked hair falling across his brow.

its unclear what exactly gendry believes happened to arya but if he does think she was sold to the boltons then the parallels between him and jon at this point are even stronger. both of arya’s bastard boys are devastated by this news and want to kill the man arya allegedly married. their mundane actions (crushing a letter, working on a sword) are likened to violent acts against explicitly in jons case - ramsay. its left ambiguous in gendrys since he’s no pov but i think its safe to assume his imagined foe is whoever he believes hurt arya

reblog.comment:

Gendry was at his forge, bare-chested beneath his leather apron. He was beating on a sword as if he wished it were a foe, his sweat-soaked hair falling across his brow.

its unclear what exactly gendry believes happened to arya but if he does think she was sold to the boltons then the parallels between him and jon at this point are even stronger. both of arya’s bastard boys are devastated by this news and want to kill the man arya allegedly married. their mundane actions (crushing a letter, working on a sword) are likened to violent acts against explicitly in jons case - ramsay. its left ambiguous in gendrys since he’s no pov but i think its safe to assume his imagined foe is whoever he believes hurt arya

its unclear what exactly gendry believes happened to arya but if he does think she was sold to the boltons then the parallels between him and jon at this point are even stronger. both of arya’s bastard boys are devastated by this news and want to kill the man arya allegedly married. their mundane actions (crushing a letter, working on a sword) are likened to violent acts against explicitly in jons case - ramsay. its left ambiguous in gendrys since he’s no pov but i think its safe to assume his imagined foe is whoever he believes hurt arya

summary:
Sansa : What is he like ? That Jaqen ?
Arya : He has a mind of a genius and a body of a mortal sin.
